description: This file is a Dart script for automating workspace tasks such as fetching dependencies, analyzing code, and running tests for a Flutter project. It defines functions to run shell commands and executes different workflows based on command-line arguments.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes a command with arguments in a subprocess, optionally in a specified working directory, and waits for its completion returning the exit code.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point that performs different automation steps such as 'pub_get', 'analyze', 'test', or all, depending on command-line arguments.
